title: DeSci: Co-Designing The Future of Science
description:
Connect with leaders in the DeSci Space to co-design the future of science. 

This workshop aims to connect: 
- Developers & technical leaders by elevating your technology to be used by the DeSci community
- Scientists & former scientists who can share needs in science to be solved for
- DeSci leaders who can showcase what is happening now in DeSci and the visions the space is working towards 

Let's build a more collaborative, trustful, and effective scientific future together!
